posts.post_content:
One of the nicest SGC 30's you will find.  No creases or wrinkles that I can see.  I think its undergraded as Ive seen miscuts grade as high as a 40  (the grade appears to be based entirely on the miscut as far as I can tell).

$1000 shipped/insured.
